go_data.justification: Growth hormone has hormone activity as indicated by its role in regulating various physiological processes.

go_data.term: regulation of skeletal muscle calcium homeostasis
go_data.justification: Growth hormone secretagogues prevent dysregulation of skeletal muscle calcium homeostasis.

go_data.term: regulation of skeletal muscle sodium channel activity
go_data.justification: Growth hormone treatment leads to partial recovery of skeletal muscle sodium channel properties.
